reporting-org.narrative: Makerere University School of Public Health

description.narrative: This activity was focused on completion of two manuscripts and submitting them to the program lead. Review monitoring data two consortium members and development of the learning agenda. It also focused on validation of DHIS2 data and initiating the planning for midline survey

participating-org.narrative: Makerere University School of Public Health

activity-date.narrative: All activities were conducted as planned on the project calender

recipient-country.narrative: Funds were sent by the lead organization to Uganda. All the spent funds were reimbursed

sector.narrative: 89% of the planned budget was spent on the the planned activities
